result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Restitution Stipulation in the probation amount of $460.47 plus surcharge for a total of $506.52 (as a conditions of probation in caes #16CF221).
Filed by District Attorney Jane Kohlwey

Defendant Brianna Jo Mootz in court with attorney Brent Wayne Varner.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases called: 16CF310, 16CF311, 16CF309, 16CF308, 16CF301, 16CF226, 16CF221, and 16CM39. In 16CF308, 16CF226, and 16CF221   Waiver of Preliminary Hearing filed. Court found probable cause, bound defendant over.  Information filed, reading waived. In 16CF308, 16CF221, and 16CF226  Rights/Elements.  In 16CF226 Defendant pled no contest to Ct. 1.  Court found guilty.  Judgment was entered.  Cts. 2 & 3 Dismissed but read in.  In16CF308 defendant pled no contest to Ct. 1.  Court found guilty.  Judgment was entered.  Cts. 2,3, & 4 Dismissed but read in.  In 16CF221 Defendant pled no contest to Ct. 2.  Court found guilty.  Judgment was entered.  Cts. 1,3, & 4 Dismissed.  16CM39, 16CF301, 16CF309, 16CF310, & 16CF311 Dismissed but read in. In all 16CF308 Ct. 1 Court withheld sentencing, placed defendant on probation for 5 years.  Conditions of probation include: AODA and comply, Submit DNA sample, Psychological evaluation and comply.  $528.00 costs.  Restitution plus surcharge from this and the other cases.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  In 16CF221 Ct. 2 Court withheld sentencing, placed defendant on probation for 5 years.  Conditions of probation include: AODA and comply, Submit DNA sample, Psychological evaluation and comply.  $518.00 costs.  Restitution plus surcharge for dismissed but read in charges.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  In 16CF226 Ct. 1 Court withheld sentencing, placed defendant on probation for 5 years.  Conditions of probation include: AODA and comply, Submit DNA sample, Psychological evaluation and comply.  $528.00 costs.  Restitution plus surcharge from stipulation.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  3 months jail, with Huber for work and treatment.  Jail credit to be determined.  Jail start on 1/6/17 at 7:00 pm.  Bond on hand to be applied towards restitution and costs.  11:04/11:38
plea/sentence on 12/9/16 @ 11:00 a.m.

Cases called: 16CF221, 16CF226, 16CF301, 16CF308, 16CF309, 16CF310, 16CF311, 16CM39, Defendant Brianna Jo Mootz in court, in custody with attorney Brent W. Varner.  Jane E. Return date scheduled for October 27, 2016 at 02:45 pm.
